root: ^You sitting in the hospital's cafeteria when a beautiful girl walks towards you.
^Layla: Hi there, you must be Riley. I'm Dr Andrews
^You pause and take a look at her
^Riley: Nice to meet you Dr Andrews. Not to be rude or anything but you don't really look like a doctor.

^Layla: I get that alot. I like to dress in casual clothing to make my patients less nervous. Most of my patients are young and so am I. I want patients to fell like I'm going through the journey with them and not telling them what to do.

P1: ^Layla: Oh and you can call me Layla.
^Layla: So are we ready to get started??
N1: ^Well at least she's young so that eases my anxiety a bit.
^Layla: You can call me Layala. If it'll make you less anxious.
P2: ^Layla: That's the spirit. it's all about a positive mindset!!
^Layla: Havin a positive mindset is key, with the roght mindset you push yourself to get better and bonus you get to build good relatinships meaning more support for you.
^Layla: Also don't forget to ask for help when you need it.
N2: ^Riley: Uh yeah... just thinking about other things. I'm ready!
^Layla: Okay then let's get into into
